content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** although the picture on the website shows a duck and a sheep in the first picture this pattern is *only* for a sheep you can find the duck pattern here 2 no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials ** japanese size 5/0 6/0 & 7/0 crochet hook 3 0 3 5 & 4 0mm the second recommended yarn pierrot a167 linen 3 is actually 100% ramie despite the name 1 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/amikomoumeharu-9/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/27-28-565d-amigurumi-duck 3 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/629452/629455/629994/
